ul.li: The URIs used for the types should be unique
If a value set is specified, then there must be no ambiguous codes in it, since the codes are used without a system

div.p: This specification defines the following security roles that may be used as values for the claim type "http://hl7.org/fhir/security-role":

ul.li: http://hl7.org/fhir/security-role/[grant|deny]/[op], where [op] = the name of an interaction or an operation defined not a type
http://hl7.org/fhir/security-role/[type]/[grant|deny]/[op], where [op] = the name of an interaction or an operation defined on a type, and [type] is a known resource type
